p: A few representative samples positive for respiratory viruses (Influenza B, Influenza A(H3N2), RSV, HMPV, HPIV-3, coronaviruses, measles, bocavirus) were sequenced and phylogenetic trees were constructed to compare with other Indian and foreign strains. [Genetic sequences of Influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 isolates are described in chapter 3].
